Translations.Text: Mi sen inna gmat sen Hud: "day ur tepeezzibem ara
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Ur awen ssutre$ kra n teqdiat, ilmend n waya. Ih, taqdiat iw, apan kan, ar Mass imavalen
Day a tbennum, di yal ti$ilt, assekni i tfukal nnwen
La tepparam lebouj, amar haat a pwekkoem
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Eezzbet i Win i wen Ifkan ayen teeoam
Nek, ugade$ aaaqeb fellawen, ass ameqwoaean
Ih, ayagi, siwa d asnulfu imezwura
Ur nelli d wid ara ippuaaqben
Nekoen t. Nesqucc iten. Deg wayagi d assekni, war ccekk. Tegwti degsen, ur llin d lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
